title: Eyes of the Werewolf
overview: A laboratory accident leaves Rich blind and at the mercy of an unscrupulous surgeon who performs an accidental eye transplant. Unknown to everyone, including the doctor's band of organ-snatching murderers, the eyes were pulled from the sockets of a werewolf. All hell breaks loose when Rich, with the help of his horny nurse, a midget and a lesbian detective, tries to extract revenge during the next full moon.
